DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Study Multi-target Therapy Maintenance Treatment Lupus Nephritis
DOC.detailed_description: Azathioprine ( AZA ) use maintenance therapy lupus nephritis many year . We compare efficacy safety multi-target therapy continuous induction maintenance treatment v CTX-Aza .

Patients diagnose lupus nephritis accord ISN/RPS 2003 classification criterion , class Ⅲ , Ⅳ , Ⅳ+Ⅴ , Ⅲ+Ⅴ Ⅴ LN renal biopsy 4 . All patient receive induction therapy 6 month multitherapy ( FK506 + MMF ) intravenous CTX pulse . 5 . Patients recruit receive partial remission complete remission 6 month induction therapy .
